thread.title: Caroline Cawthon Mosely
thread.title_full: RC Planet reviewed by Caroline Cawthon Mosely

author: Caroline Cawthon Mosely
title: Caroline Cawthon Mosely
text: I purchased a drone from RC Planet. Not only did they not send the correct one, but they failed to reinburse me for the returned item until I contacted them to ask them to do so, which was WEEKS after they had received the returned item. If I had not contacted them, I probably would have never been reinbursed. Very disappointing, and the people in customer service couldn't have cared less about the situation.
